repos.name: dnd-rag-helper
repos.description: Local RAG-Based AI Assistant for D&D 5e An advanced, privacy-focused tabletop companion built using LangChain, Ollama, and ChromaDB. This system enables Dungeon Masters and players to query the vast D&D 5e rulebook ecosystem with zero cloud dependency.
repos.readme_summary: Privacy-focused RAG assistant using LangChain, Ollama, ChromaDB for offline D&D 5e rule queries

repos.name: DnDbug
repos.description: DnDbug is an AI-driven storytelling assistant designed to help Game Masters (GMs) plan, structure, and run Dungeons & Dragons sessions more efficiently. It supports the creative process from initial concept to scene-by-scene storytelling â€” while keeping the GM fully in control.
repos.readme_summary: AI-driven storytelling assistant for session planning, structure, and scene-by-scene storytelling

repos.name: dm-hud
repos.description: Real-time AI-powered assistant for D&D 5.5e Dungeon Masters - Automatic entity tracking, character milestones, and session reports
repos.readme_summary: DM HUD v0.8.0 - Real-time assistant with automatic entity tracking, milestones, session reports for D&D 5.5e

repos.name: DND_DM
repos.description: Python-based Dungeons & Dragons 5e assistant with AI-powered Dungeon Master, cinematic text-to-speech narration, and manual speech-to-text player input for immersive tabletop RPG experiences.
repos.readme_summary: Python D&D 5e assistant with AI DM, TTS narration, STT player input for immersive gameplay

repos.name: natural20-rag
repos.description: An advanced RAG-based AI assistant for Dungeons & Dragons (5e). Built with LlamaIndex, Ollama, and Qdrant to provide precise rule interpretations
repos.readme_summary: RAG assistant using LlamaIndex, Ollama, Qdrant for precise D&D 5e rule interpretations

repos.name: ai-dm-assistant
repos.description: AI Dungeon Master assistant for Session Prep

repos.name: gary
repos.description: Gary the Dungeon Master AI Assistant

repos.name: DnD-RAG-Chatbot
repos.description: An AI-powered assistant that learns Dungeons & Dragons (D&D 5e) rules from PDFs, answers rules questions using a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipeline, and falls back to web search + a cloud LLM when local context is not enough.

repos.name: NLP_RPG_Narrative_Assistant
repos.description: An AI-powered virtual assistant for Dungeon Masters. Uses Natural Language Processing (NLP) to generate coherent, ready-to-play narratives for short RPG one-shot sessions. UFG Postgraduate Thesis Project.
